description.value:
Straining both your patience and your keen ears, you hear nothing in the duke's private chamber. That's why you're so surprised to see the duke when you boldly enter.

Level: 1
Category: Warding
Time: 10 minutes
Duration: 24 hours
Component Cost: 30 gp
Market Price: 75 gp
Key Skill: Arcana (no check)

You ward a single room (or a burst 4 area), against eavesdropping. Creatures attempting to listen to something in the warded area from outside the area take a â€“10 penalty to their Perception checks.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 312.
